About Hills Tax

Toronto's trusted cross-border tax specialists with over 15 years of dedicated service.

Our Story

Founded in Toronto, Hills Tax was built on a simple belief: cross-border tax compliance shouldn't be a source of stress. With Canada and the United States sharing the world's longest international border, millions of people and businesses have financial ties to both countries. Yet finding a tax professional who truly understands both systems can be incredibly difficult.

That's where we come in. Our team of experienced tax professionals specializes in the unique challenges of Canada-US taxation. We've spent over 15 years building deep expertise in both the Canadian Revenue Agency (CRA) and Internal Revenue Service (IRS) systems, helping over 500 clients navigate their cross-border obligations with confidence.

Today, Hills Tax serves individuals, families, and businesses throughout the Greater Toronto Area and across Canada. Whether you're an American expat, a Canadian snowbird, a cross-border business owner, or simply someone with financial ties to both countries, we have the expertise to help.

Our Values

Integrity

We maintain the highest ethical standards in everything we do. Your trust is our most valued asset, and we earn it through honest, transparent service.

Expertise

We invest heavily in ongoing education and training to stay current with ever-changing tax laws in both Canada and the United States.

Client Focus

Every client receives personalized attention. We take the time to understand your unique situation and provide tailored solutions that work for you.

Excellence

We hold ourselves to the highest professional standards. Every return we prepare, every plan we create is thoroughly reviewed for accuracy and optimization.
